Coronary artery disease document least one following : Myocardial infarction least 12 month enrollment plan percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) Angina pectoris asymptomatic myocardial ischemia undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) least 12 month enrollment plan percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) 2 . Peripheral arterial disease undergo percutaneous transluminal angioplasty ( PTA ) peripheral artery bypass graft least 6 month enrollment 3 . Symptomatic cerebral infarction cerebral hemorrhage least 6 month enrollment The exclusion criterion set follow : 1 . History worsen heart failure within precede 6 month 2 . Planned elective percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) within antecede 3 month 3 . History myocardial infarction , unstable angina pectoris , percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) coronary artery bypass grafting ( CABG ) within precede 12 month 4 .
